lines.text: I feel as if I were drinking at my own wake.
Come in, Victor... I've been expecting you... I lied.
Maybe it's only you who is wretched, Victor.
I have always had a supressed desire to see a grave opened... especially at night.
You ought to have a police whistle too - just in case.
Yes, I should, but how would you blow a whistle if somebody cut your throat?
I never thought of that - no wind!
